Игра "огонь"!!! В буквальном смысле, у меня вся жопа в огне, но что нам делать? Мы эту игру сильно любим, так и сильно ненавидем!

Simple yet complex game, the competitive scene of CSGO is very large. And within reason: Learning recoil patterns of all weapons, map locations, learning call outs, flashbangs and smoke are just a few of the things in competitive. CSGO is very fun shooter if your looking to just relax though too. There is community browser. And a battle royale mode (never played it). The market, downloadable maps, etc. Just get it! its free and fun with friends!
